movie.title: What We Do Is Secret
movie.plot: The true-life story of Darby Crash, who became an L.A. punk icon after getting kicked out of high school and forming The Germs with a collection of friends who have little experience with their instruments or playing music.

events.title: the Germs play their first gig
the Germs play a farewell gig at Starwood
the Germs play as "Germs Incognito" at the Whisky a Go Go
